channel.title: -->help me please<---->about wildy<-->if you help me out:rep++<-->read<--
channel.description:
Hey, :D
I've a question: How do I make a piece of wildernis in a runescape private server? I know that in client.java public boolean nonwild is that you can make a safe zone, but can you attack eachother then?
thanxx
so: 1. How do I make a piece of wildernis 2. Is public boolean nonwild that you can attack eachother, but you do not lost your stuff?
thanxx
Sorry for my bad english, i am Dutch.

item.title: -->help me please<---->about wildy<-->if you help me out:rep++<-->read<--
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

Well if u dont make it safe then it has 2 be wildy.

So unless u have done the whole map as a safe zone then it should be wildy anyway.

Brendan

Read full topic
